core.name: Star Kinght's Journey
core.description: Team Physical DMG +30%, Team weapon skill Crit Rate +35%

subskills.name: Star Kinght's Journey
subskills.description: Team Physical DMG +30%, Team weapon skill Crit Rate +35%

core.name: Glory of Schariac
core.description:
The black armor turns into a horse.
Knight Form:
1st Sequence: Deals 150%+200% ATK of Physical DMG.
2nd Sequence: Deals 3x120% ATK of Physical DMG.
3rd Sequence: Deals 400% ATK of Physical DMG.
4th Sequence: Deals 600% ATK of Physical DMG.

While galloping, press dodge button to [Stomp], hold ATK button to [Charge] and release atk button during [Charge] to deal [Elite Strike]
Stomp: Deal 350% ATK Physical DMG, pull nearby enemies, and can hold ATK button to connect to [Charge]
Charge: Deal Nx110% ATK Physical DMG (N = number of hits, max 10), hitting enemy consumes meter.
Elite Strike: Deal 800% ATK Physical DMG
[Stomp] [Charge] [Elite Strike] are all Charged ATK

subskills.name: Valkyrie's Path
subskills.description: [Elite Strike] deals additional 400% ATK Physical DMG.

subskills.name: Valkyrie's Legacy
subskills.description: [Charge] [Elite Strike] Total DMG +60%, Crit Rate +100%, Crit DMG +60%

subskills.name: Valkyrie's Glory
subskills.description: Each attack of Charge deals additional 30% ATK Physical DMG

core.name: Riding Aria
core.description:
Guardian Form: Weapon skill restore 50 meter, Ultimate evasion or Retaliation restore 100 meter, max 300 meter.
Knight Form: While moving, meter gradually charges up. When meter is full, Krishna starts to gallop. When PE leaving the field, clears all meter.

subskills.name: Genius
subskills.description: When switching forms, reset the CD of evasion skill. CD: 8s

subskills.name: Seed of Sumeru
subskills.description: Weapon skill Physical DMG +20%, Crit DMG +20%

subskills.name: Holy Sword's Blessing
subskills.description: Enemies receive 25% more Physical DMG from PE (independent bonus)

core.name: Palatinus March
core.description:
Mount a warhorse and increase the speed to the limit, Ult causes huge physical damage to the target.
Tap Ult to switch forms. Switching from Knight to Guardian form activates Shield Burst; Switching from Guardian to Knight form triggers evasion skill.

Hold Ult buton to ult
Dual form stigmata power merges as one, spiralling lance to unleash a devastating attack. Deal 2000% ATK Physical DMG in a large area. Pauses timer. SP cost: 100, CD: 20s

subskills.name: Herrscher Slayer
subskills.description: When ult hits IMG enemies, deals dmg to IMG core too, at 150.0% rate (direct hp loss effect)

subskills.name: Echo of Flames
subskills.description: Ult Total DMG +40.0%, Ult is guaranteed to crit.

core.name: Antinomian Duality
core.description:
Evasion skill: Trigger 2s Time Fracture and restore full meter. CD: 15s

Guardian Form: Hold down evasion to [Defense], press forward+evasion to [Shield Burst]
[Defense] When attacked during this period, nullify enemy attack and counter with 120% ATK Physical DMG, and can trigger evasion skill.
[Shield Burst] Can trigger the same effect by bashing the enemy, can also trigger evasion skill. After Ultimate evasion or counter attack, tap basic attak to connect to [Upward Slash], and if ultimate evasion skill is triggered, it connects to [Palatinus Slash].
Knight Form: Non-ultimate evasion triggers evasion skill. (Can't trigger evasion skill while Krishna is galloping) When triggering evasion skill, press directional button to enter galloping state, tap evasion key to [Stomp] and long press ATK button to [Charge].

subskills.name: QTE - Symmetry Breaking
subskills.description: QTE: Triggered by time slow or enemy knocked up. Enter as Knight form, trigger 2s Time Fracture, deal 1000.0% ATK Physical DMG, and restore full meter.

subskills.name: For Thyself
subskills.description: During battle, starting sp +40. Triggers every 10 mins in Open World.

core.name: Immortal Kaslana
core.description:
Guardian Form:
1st Sequence: Deals 150%+200% ATK of Physical DMG.
2nd Sequence: Deals 220% ATK of Physical DMG.
3rd Sequence: Deals 8x80 ATK of Physical DMG and briefly pulls enemies.
4th Sequence: Deals 300% ATK of Physical DMG.
When meter is full, hold ATK button to trigger a Palatinus Slash, trigger 3s Time Fracture, deal 300% + 300% + 200% + 1200% ATK Physical DMG.
Shield Burst: Deals 150% ATK Physical DMG.
Upward Slash: Deals 800% ATK Physical DMG.

subskills.name: Shield of the People
subskills.description: Palatinus Slash's last blow deals additional 400% ATK Physical DMG.

subskills.name: Chimera's Legacy
subskills.description: When switching from Knight form to Guardian form, ultimate evasion skill is triggered, and restores 150 meter

subskills.name: Primordial Stigmata
subskills.description: Palatinus Slash Crit rate +40.0%, Total DMG +35.0%
